import React, { useContext,useState } from "react"; import noteContext from "../context api/notes/noteContext"; const AddNote=(props)=> { const context = useContext(noteContext); const {addNote } = context; const [note, setNote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) const handleclick=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addNote(note.title,note.description,note.tag); setNote({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) props.showAlert("Added successfully") } const onChange=(e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) //spread operator } return (

Add a Note

); } export default AddNote;
